text: Gerald Weiß (8 January 1960 – 17 February 2018) was an East German javelin thrower. He was born in Lübz, Germany. His personal best throw was 83.30 metres, achieved in June 1988 in Jena. He participated in the 1988 Summer Olympics. Weiß died in Kloster Lehnin, Germany on 17 February 2018 at the age of 58. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympians for East Germany Category:Javelin throwers
title: Gerald Weiß
